name: Road Burners
overview:
Road Burners was produced by Atari in 1999.

A highly detailed motorcycle racing game in Washington D.C., London, Paris, Las Vegas, or the Isle of Man.
It features a tilting motorcycle and the ability to be hooked to other like machines for up to 8 simultaneous players.
The player's score is based upon the distance accumulated in the time limit. Players must pass checkpoints to earn additional time.
